mapper.select: select re.id as request_id, re.request_experience_status, re.created_datetime as request_datetime, u.id as user_id, u.user_name, u.user_email, u.user_phone, en.id as experience_notice_id, en.experience_notice_title, en.company_id from tbl_request_experience re join tbl_user u on re.member_id = u.id join tbl_experience_notice en on re.experience_notice_id = en.id where re.member_id = #{memberId} and en.id = #{experienceNoticeId} order by re.id desc
